element.name: CriteriaOperators
element.short: Operators for each search criteria type

element.name: TTableType
element.short: Enumeration defining table types present in the user database
element.descr: Each table type represents a table in the database.

element.name: TableNames
element.short: Table names for each table type

element.name: TableAliases
element.short: Table aliases for each table type.

element.name: TSearchDataType
element.short: Types of data used in searches.

element.name: TCustomSearchField
element.descr: It has fields for data types, criteria, values to search, and if it is a lookup field.

element.name: TSearchField
element.short: Search field class used on advanced filters
element.descr: Inherits from TCustomSearchField and adds field name and display name.

element.name: TSortedField
element.descr: It has data for field name to sort, direction of sorting, collation, and if it is a lookup field.

element.name: TSearchGroup
element.short: Represents a group of fields used in a search
element.descr: Each group may contain multiple fields and define a conditional logic between them (AND/OR).

element.name: TCustomSearch
element.short: Structure that manage complex database searches
element.descr: It combines parameters to generate SQL queries for a database table.

element.name: SearchTypeByName
element.short: Get type for a data type name

element.name: CampoByName
element.short: Get type of field type name

element.name: LoadTablesDict
element.short: Create and load the tables dictionary (table name and table type)

element.name: LoadLocaleTablesDict
element.short: Create and load the translated tables dictionary (table type and translated table name)

element.name: TCustomSearch.RunSearch
element.short: Run the search query using the defined filters and sortings
element.descr: Returns the number of records found.

element.name: TDBParams.LoadParams
element.short: Load params from connections table of the system database

element.name: TTablesDictionary
element.short: Type to map table names to table types

element.name: TLocaleTablesDictionary
element.short: Type to map table types to localized table names

element.name: TSearchField.DisplayName
element.short: Friendly field name displayed to users

element.name: TCustomSearch.GetSQLString
element.short: Generate the SQL for the query

dl.dd: Type of table to be searched.

element.name: TSearchGroup.Create
element.short: Create an instance of search group with conditional logic (AND/OR)

dl.dd: Type of logical operator used to combine fields: aoAnd or aoOr.

element.name: TSearchGroup.Destroy
element.short: Destroys the search group, freeing the allocated memory for the fields

element.name: TSearchGroup.Fields
element.short: List of fields that compose this search group

element.name: TSearchGroup.AndOr
element.short: Type of logical operator used to connect the fields of the group
